segments.text: Any new ideas on the Mr . Fro case ? How can we give this motor oil a new brand identity ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me get my morning coffee to get my brain working again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I could use one , too . I'm still burnt out from that last cigarette ad campaign .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As long as the foam on my macchiato's not burnt , too , I'll be alright for a while . You got your espresso , Jess ?
segments.speaker: S2
